name: Simple Login Logout
author: Yahya Mohammed

sections.description: This simple plugin makes your life easier by adding a login and logout link to your navigation menu out of the box. It adds a login link with a “Log in” text to your navigation menu automatically if logged out, it changes to a “log out” text with a logout link with WordPress nonce if logged in. Which means you won’t run to a WordPress warning while trying to logout from a custom logout link again.
sections.installation: 1. Install the plugin and activate it, no further action is required.
sections.faq:
Do I have to edit menu?

No, you don’t have to edit anything, just activate the plugin and it will automatically detect the navigation menu by itself.

How can I help?

Well, you can help in multiple ways. You can contribute to this plugin and make it better, you can donate any amount you want or you can just give us some encouraging rate. Thank you.
